name: UNMOVABLE
description:
Hello it's Galaxy Folks here again. This is a Local Multiplayer Game Based on the Theme "You're not the Hero", We think it's suits to the Theme. It's made with the Unity Game Engine, So thanks to Unity Technologies, It's made with the help of many people, so thanks to them all. Thanks to everyone who supported us during the making of the game, Game Engine - Unity, Language - C#, Code Editor - VsCode, Audio Assets - Bosca Ceoil and online websites, the Graphical Assets are simple and some Squares, So there is no need of other Additional Softwares. This Game is Available on itch, GameJam, RoastMyGame, GameJolt and you can download it from where you like, The Game is totally free, and availble for Windows, MacOSX and Linux, we want to be sure that all gamers should play the Game So Please Play the Game and Enjoy and follow us on itch, and on other Game Communtites. Scroll Down for Download the Game for Free

Game Instructions

There are two Players and you need to fight each other and, which one will go down, will loose the game and other wins, ?You can move the Player1 with Arrow Keys and Shoot with Mouse, You can move the the Player2 with WASD keys and shoot with the SpaceBar Key. Good Luck for Both

Systen Requirements

MacOSX: OS:OSX 10.9 or Later - Size:At least 59.4 MB of free space - 2GB RAM

Linux: Ubuntu 12.04 or Later - Size:At least 68.9 MB of free space - 2GB RAM

Windows: OS:Windows XP or Later - Size:At least 52.5 MB of free Space - 2GB RAM
